title: 游戏崩溃，求帮助
author: 多正笑
txt_content:
他说
Exception in thread "Thread-14" AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
怎么办
求解

replies.author: Freeze_Dolphin
replies.txt_content:
多正笑 发表于 2020-2-21 12:47
不行
Error occurred during initialization of VM
这个的意思是空闲内存（RAM）不足2097152KB（约合2GB），你关掉一些软件再运行mc吧

看了一下你的日志，加载了这么多模组。。。内存应该至少分1.5GB才能运行（不保证流畅）吧

replies.author: 多正笑
replies.txt_content:
日志：
[12:02:32] [main/INFO]: Setting user: 123 [12:02:41] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.1 [12:03:20] [Client thread/INFO]: Caught error stitching, removing all assigned resourcepacks java.lang.NullPointerException         at lumien.resourceloader.ResourceLoader.insertForcedPack(ResourceLoader.java:36) ~[ResourceLoader.class:?]         at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_110436_a(Minecraft.java:609) [bao.class:?]         at cpw.mods.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.beginMinecraftLoading(FMLClientHandler.java:238) [FMLClientHandler.class:?]         at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_71384_a(Minecraft.java:480) [bao.class:?]         at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.func_99999_d(Minecraft.java:878) [bao.class:?]         at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:148) [Main.class:?]         at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_221]         at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]         at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]         at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:135) [launchwrapper-1.12.jar:?]         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.12.jar:?] [12:03:20] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default

Freeze_Dolphin 发表于 2020-2-21 12:53
这个的意思是空闲内存（RAM）不足2097152KB（约合2GB），你关掉一些软件再运行mc吧

我最多只能腾出1GB，是不是要删一些模组？（整合包作者没修改合成配方，模组是独立的）

replies.author: 多正笑
replies.txt_content: 啊 算了 我的电脑不配玩MC~~~

replies.author: Freeze_Dolphin
replies.txt_content:
多正笑 发表于 2020-2-21 13:06
啊 算了 我的电脑不配玩MC~~~
低配电脑建议玩纯净的，或者用轻量级的模组，forge特别吃内存
512mb内存可以流畅带起纯净1.12.2 + optifine了（不装forge）
1.14.2 + fabric用1024mb也可以流畅带起
